Title: Provides a religious exemption for the requirement to have a photograph taken for a driver's license or learner's permit
Summary: Provides a religious exemption for the requirement to have a photograph taken for a driver's license or learner's permit.
LawCode: Amd ยง507, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to providing a religious exemption for the requirement to have a photograph taken for a driver's license or learner's permit
